Articles.Content: The "a vessel with this name already exist, do you want to replace it" is bugged, as in if you click any of the answers, you will select any piece behind it. At least in the VAB, constantly happens with zero exceptions.

Yeah we know, the only explanation I can think of is that Unity3D must default to allowing click-through of UI elements, as every time this comes up Squad has to explicitly block the UI from clicking through, most have been but the new ones still show this behaviour.

Maybe a modder can show us a screenshot of Unity's button options.

On the one hand, it's unwanted behaviour, on the other hand, it's doing exactly what it was told to do, marking as a bug anyway...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-18T12:34:15Z" title="05/18/2015 12:34  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 18, 2015</time> by sal\_vager**
